articles.title: Annie Awards Winners List – Updating Live - Deadline
articles.description: The 2026 Annie Awards for animations were handed out February 21, and here are the winners.

articles.title: Gavin Newsom ‘Bans’ Kid Rock From Entering California - The Daily Beast
articles.description: “America’s favorite governor” is not impressed by the MAGA singer’s recent workout video.

articles.title: Mark Ruffalo Questions James Cameron’s Disapproval of Netflix-Warner Bros. Deal, Support of Paramount - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: "The next question to Mr Cameron should be this… 'Are you also against the monopolization that a Paramount acquisition would create? Or is it just that of Netflix?'" the 'Task' actor wrote on Saturday.

articles.title: ‘Scrubs’ Revival: Who’s Back (& Who’s Not); How Many Episodes Judy Reyes, John C. McGinley Are In; How Many Kids J.D. & Elliot, Turk & Carla Have Now - Deadline
articles.description: 'Scrubs' revival cheatsheet: Who is back; How many episodes Judy Reyes & John C. McGinley are in; How many kids J.D. & Elliot and Turk & Carla have.

articles.title: Dave Grohl opens up on Foo Fighters 'complications' after Taylor Hawkins' death - The Mirror US
articles.description: Foo Fighters frontman Dave Grohl has opened up about the band's decision to continue following the tragic death of drummer Taylor Hawkins, who was found dead aged 50 in his hotel room in March 2022

articles.title: ‘Paradise’ Season 2’s Rotten Tomatoes Score Solidifies As Reviews Pour In - Forbes
articles.description: Hulu's Paradise season 2 now has a Rotten Tomatoes score, and it may indicate whether or not you should watch it this week.

articles.title: Ilker Çatak’s ‘Yellow Letters’ Wins Berlinale Golden Bear - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Sandra Hüller took best acting honors for her gender-shifting role in 'Rose,' Anna Calder-Marshall and Tom Courtney won best supporting for 'Queen at Sea.'

articles.title: Barry Manilow reschedules tour dates again after 'depressing visit' to the doctor: 'My body had been through hell' - Entertainment Weekly
articles.description: Barry Manilow, who announced his lung cancer diagnosis in December 2025, said that a 'depressing visit' with his doctor has prompted him to reschedule several tour dates on his upcoming Last Concerts farewell tour.

articles.title: "He Doesn't Have To Answer It": Mark Wahlberg's Awkward "The View" Interview Has To Be Seen To Be Believed - Yahoo News Canada
Timothée Chalamet Reflects on the End of ‘Dune,’ Calls the Finale the ‘Eeriest’ Movie in the Trilogy: ‘I Was More Intense on the Third One’ - Variety
articles.description: Timothée Chalamet teased 'Dune: Part Three' while discussing his career with Matthew McConaughey during Variety and CNN's town hall event.

articles.title: Eric Dane’s Friends Launch GoFundMe After His Death to ‘Support His Girls and Their Future Needs’ - Variety
articles.description: Eric Dane’s closest friends started a GoFundMe to raise money for his wife and two daughters after the actor’s death on Feb. 19.

articles.title: ‘I Don’t Want to Move in Fear’: Timothée Chalamet Reunites with ‘Interstellar’ Dad Matthew McConaughey to Talk Christopher Nolan, ‘Marty Supreme’ and a Stinky Trailer Prank - Variety
articles.description: In a town hall with Variety and CNN, Timothée Chalamet and Matthew McConaughey reunite years after 'Interstellar' to discuss their careers.

articles.title: Box Office: 'Wuthering Heights' Leads Again With $4.6 Million - Variety
articles.description: 'Wuthering Heights' won the Friday box office again, legging out newcomers 'How to Make a Killing' and 'I Can Only Imagine 2.'

articles.title: Former 'Jersey Shore' star Snooki says she has cervical cancer - ABC7 Los Angeles
articles.description: Nicole "Snooki" Polizzi said Friday that she has cervical cancer.

articles.title: Did James Van Der Beek Really Die Broke? - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Hollywood has rallied behind the late 'Dawson’s Creek' star, raising $2.6 million for his widow and six children. But the internet has been less generous, with scores of posters wondering why such a famous actor would need a fundraiser in the first place.

articles.title: Did One of the Greatest Movies of 1976 Predict Our Effed-Up Present? - Rolling Stone
articles.description: 'Network' turns 50 this year — and Paddy Chayefsky's mad-as-hell satire somehow feels more shocking, more sobering, and more timely than ever.

articles.title: Manon Taking a Hiatus From KATSEYE to ‘Focus on Her Health & Wellbeing’ - Billboard
articles.description: KATSEYE announced late Friday (Feb. 20) that Manon is taking a temporary hiatus from the girl group "to focus on her health and wellbeing."

articles.title: A Surfer Examines Robert Duvall’s Most Famous Line Ever, In One of His Most Iconic Roles - The Inertia
